Class-methods for generated controller-class

Methods

set_model_class  

Public Instance methods

set_model_class(model_class_name)

Set the model-class-name for the controller-class. As a side-effect this setting generates methods the class-methods

  • model_class
  • resources_name

to publish these informations on the controller-class
